biotools.summary: An open-source, freely available tool that automatically downloads, assembles, and processes public The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) data, to facilitate downstream data analysis by relieving investigators from the burdens of data preparation.

bioschemas.name: TCGA-Assembler
bioschemas.summary: An open-source, freely available tool that automatically downloads, assembles, and processes public The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) data, to facilitate downstream data analysis by relieving investigators from the burdens of data preparation.
